title: The motion photo option is disabled on my Pixel 4 camera and I cannot enable it.
content:
The motion photo option is disabled on my Pixel 4 camera and I cannot enable it. A few further pieces of information:
- I purchased the phone in Canada. I did not notice this while I was there.
- I am in Japan, where motion gestures are disabled. 
- I was recently on a trip to Australia, and also could not get the motion photo function to turn on.

Below is a photo of what I see in the camera app:

https://photos.app.goo.gl/VWS3TqLDMaU9Ze897

How can I get this enabled?
